appDescription.message: Login, sync user queue to Core App, and show compiled queue.

markDoneNext.message: Mark as done and go next
markDoneNext.description: Mark as done and go next button tooltip

notInQueue.message: This video is not on your queue
notInQueue.description: Warning when video is not in queue

loginSubtitle.message: Welcome back! Please sign in to continue

logoutDescription.message: Sign out from your QEFY account

confirmSignOut.message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

signOutError.message: Error signing out. Please try again.
signOutError.description: Error message when sign out fails

pleaseEnterVideoUrl.description: Error message when no URL is provided

pleaseEnterValidUrl.description: Error message when URL is invalid

videoAddedSuccessfully.description: Success message when video is added

failedToAddVideo.description: Error message when video addition fails

clipboardNoValidUrl.message: Clipboard does not contain a valid URL
clipboardNoValidUrl.description: Error message when clipboard doesn't have valid URL

failedToReadClipboard.description: Error message when clipboard read fails

currentTabNoValidUrl.message: Current tab does not have a valid URL
currentTabNoValidUrl.description: Error message when current tab URL is invalid

couldNotGetCurrentTabUrl.message: Could not get current tab URL
couldNotGetCurrentTabUrl.description: Error message when current tab URL cannot be retrieved

enterEmailPassword.message: Enter email and password to sign in.

emailPasswordRequired.description: Error message when email or password is missing

nowPlaying.description: Now playing header in floating UI

noMediaNext.description: Message when no media is next in queue

pleaseSelectAnother.description: Message when queue is ended and user should select another

playingNow.description: Header text for the floating UI showing current media

cleanupDescription.message: This scans all your open YouTube tabs and automatically sorts the best folder in Qefy to save your video. We won't close any tabs without your confirmation.

saveAndCloseTabs.message: Save to Qefy and close tabs
saveAndCloseTabs.description: Button to save videos and close tabs

saveKeepTabs.message: Save to Qefy but keep tabs open
saveKeepTabs.description: Button to save videos but keep tabs open

videosReady.description: Status text for ready videos count

videosFailed.description: Status text for failed videos count

waitingForSync.description: Message while waiting for sync to complete

successDescription.message: Your videos have been organized into their folders.

closeThisTab.description: Button to close the cleanup tab

stopAI.description: Button to stop AI processing and enable manual folder selection

cleanupTabsTitle.message: Clean up all my youtube tabs

cleanupTabsDescription.message: Takes all your messy YouTube tabs in Chrome and uses AI to find the best folder on QEFY. Don't worry, we will do the work first and only after your confirmation will we close your tabs

createPlaylistDescription.message: Based on my videos on queuefy and the prompt I created a new playlist. Eg: I created a playlist for me to watch during my 50-minute lunch, I want trivia videos

promptPlaceholder.message: Example: Create a playlist for my 50-minute lunch break with trivia videos

noVideosSelected.message: No videos selected. Please try a different prompt.

playlistCreatedDescription.message: Your custom playlist has been added to QEFY.

languageDescription.message: Choose your preferred language for the extension interface

aiDescription.message: On the right click of a youtube video thumbnail, the extension will automatically classify the video into the appropriate folder

aiNotAvailable.description: Message when AI is not available

enableChromeAI.message: You need to enable Google Chrome AI flag

couldNotLoadQueue.message: Could not load your queue. Please try again.
couldNotLoadQueue.description: Error when queue cannot be loaded

noYouTubeTabsFound.description: Title when no YouTube tabs found

openYouTubeTabs.message: Open some YouTube videos and try again!
openYouTubeTabs.description: Description when no YouTube tabs found

errorOccurred.message: An error occurred. Please try again.

noVideosReadyToSave.description: Error when no videos are ready to save

failedToSaveVideos.message: Failed to save videos. Please try again.

pleaseEnterPlaylistIdea.description: Error when no playlist idea is entered

queueNotLoaded.message: Queue not loaded. Please ensure you are logged in and have videos in your QEFY queue.
queueNotLoaded.description: Error when queue is not loaded

pleaseEnterFolderName.description: Error when no folder name is entered

noVideosSelectedError.description: Error when no videos are selected

themeModeDescription.message: Choose your preferred theme mode for the extension interface
